name: EASYDIGZ | Listing | Quickbooks - Final Invoice Paid
template:
Hello {{accountName}},

Thank you for your payment.

name: EASYDIGZ | Opportunity Updated - Stage Closed Won
template:
Wow {{accountName}},

Buying a home can be a challenging process. We at EasyDigz have made it our mission to lower the stress of buying real estate and increase the ease and speed of both getting a home under contract and getting the deed in your name.

We truly hope we have lived up to our goals.

Thank you for trusting us to walk with you on this journey and please let us know how we did.
Easy Digz survey

As always, if you ever need anything, do not hesitate to ask.


EasyDigz Team
919-275-5868
support@EasyDigz.com

variable_input_schema.title: propertyStreetAddress
variable_input_schema.description: This is the full street address of the property

name: EASYDIGZ | Opportunity Updated - Stage Offer Submitted
template:
Good news!
Your offer on {{address}} has officially been submitted to the seller. As soon as we have a response we will reach back out to you and discuss your options.


EasyDigz Team
919-275-5868
support@EasyDigz.com

name: EASYDIGZ | Opportunity Updated - Stage Under Contract
template:
Congratulations! Your hard work and patience has paid off and you are now officially under contract to buy {{address}}! We are here for you every step of the way so feel free to reach out with any questions you may have.

Next, we will be scheduling the home inspection and closing attorney so stay on the lookout for information regarding these.

Talk soon,
EasyDigz Team
919-275-5868
support@EasyDigz.com

variable_input_schema.title: address

variable_input_schema.description: This is the full street address of the property

name: EASYDIGZ | Listing Updated - Stage Agent Reviewed
template:
Hello {{accountName}}, as discussed on our call, we have sent you the listing documents for electronic signature. Please review the documents and if you have questions, we are here to help. Once the documents are signed we will get the 3D Tour, Pre-Inspection and Photography scheduled. Also, look out for an invoice from Quickbooks for our initial fee.

We look forward to working with you and thank you for choosing the EasyDigz Team!

name: EASYDIGZ | Opportunity Updated - Stage Due Dillegence
template:
Hello again {{accountName}},

It looks like we are about to cross another item off of our list. Your Due Diligence period is about to end which means you have completed all of the due diligence necessary to safely move forward with the purchase of this property. This includes but is not limited to; all inspections, surveys, appraisals, walk throughs, estimates, lending and other items you would like to have done in order to make sure this is the right home for you.

This also means we are getting closer to closing on this home and moving! Our agents will be in touch with you from now through closing to make sure all of the loose ends are taken care of.

As always, let us know if you need anything at all.


EasyDigz Team
919-275-5868
support@EasyDigz.com

variable_input_schema.title: propertyStreetAddress
variable_input_schema.description: This is the full street address of the property

name: EASYDIGZ | Listing Updated - Stage Sold
template:
Hello {{accountName}}, 

Congratulations! we may we made it. Thank you so much for using easy digz. We look forward to serving you in the future, please let us know how we did, and as always, tell your friends how much money you saved and how great your experience was!

name: EASYDIGZ | Listing Updated - Stage 3D Complete
template:
Hello {{accountName}},

3D photography and pre-inspection has been completed

This is an exciting moment in the sale of your awesome home! Your 3D tour and Pre-Inspection have been completed and are available on your portal. Your assigned agent will contact you soon to walk through your listing with you and review everything prior to making your listing live!

name: EASYDIGZ | Opportunity Updated - Stage Created
template:
Hello {{accountName}},

Thank you for creating your account at EasyDigz.com. Have fun on the site and remember to reach out to us if you have any questions.


EasyDigz Team
919-275-5868
support@EasyDigz.com

variable_input_schema.title: propertyStreetAddress
variable_input_schema.description: This is the full street address of the property

name: EASYDIGZ | Opportunity Updated - Stage Qualification
template:
Hi again {{accountName}},

Thank you very much for reviewing the information with our licensed real estate agent. We are working hard to get your offer together and will be sending all of the paperwork to you via email very soon for your electronic signature. Once this happens we will be submitting the offer to the seller or sellers agent on your behalf.

We will talk with you very soon!


EasyDigz Team
919-275-5868
support@EasyDigz.com

variable_input_schema.title: propertyStreetAddress
variable_input_schema.description: This is the full street address of the property

name: EASYDIGZ | Listing Updated - Stage Listing Live
template:
And drum roll please!!!! Your Listing is now live for all to see!

Yep, that is right, your listing is being marketed to hundreds of websites, the local MLS and to buyers that have requested early access to listings through our site! This is what we have all been waiting for.

Be sure to keep a close eye on your emails and phone for questions we may have or information we need to share.

Here's to a perfect contract soon!

name: EASYDIGZ | Listing | Send Inspection Event - Cannot Resubmit
template: You cannot resubmit this form. If you wish to reschedule the inspection modify the calendar event sent to you or you can reschedule the event by contacting us.

name: EASYDIGZ | Buy Now Form - New Opportunity Created
template:
Hello {{accountName}},

Thank you for making an offer using EasyDigz. If you have any questions please do not hesitate to reach out. Our office is available any time at 919-275-5868


EasyDigz Team
919-275-5868
support@EasyDigz.com
